name: Purple Arrows (GameJam Edition)
description:
An FPS Creator game made for the 2022 UNC Collegiate Game Jam.  This was made by a solo dev.

When people go missing, the Purple Arrows are there to find them.  Their mission: to create a future that is safe from kidnappings. That's a normal day in the office for the Operatives.  And today just so happens to be one of these days.  

The GameJam Version of Purple Arrow contains three missions.
